full_summary:
# EZ156-220001 F Regional Master Standing Offer for Temporary Help Services
## Tender Details
- **Solicitation Reference Number** | WS3976639064
- **Amendment Number** | 0
- **Publication Date** | October 12, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date** | November 15, 2023, at 14:00 (ET)
- **Expected Contract Start Date** | June 1, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date** | May 31, 2024
- **Notice Type** | Request for Standing Offer
- **Procurement Category** | Services
- **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Details
- **Provision of Temporary Help Services**
The successful bidder will provide temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies, as requested, for a period of 12 months or one year extension.

## Request for Standing Offer
This Request for Standing Offer is for the selection of qualified bidders to offer temporary personnel services. The successful bidders will be invited to make a Standing Offer, which will be used for the services required for the duration of the contract.

## Tender Requirements
* Units of tender: A single bid from a bidder.
* English and French language documentation available: Bid packages, including specifications and instructions for tender, are available on the Ariba procurement platform.

## Contact Information
For inquiries or tender related information, please contact:
Thomas Leboeuf
Government of Canada
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Phone: (available upon request)
Email: [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Available on the Ariba procurement platform at:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706056?extsite=MTc3MDYwNTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This is a Request for Standing Offer and will remain open for bids until the Tender Closing Date unless it is preceded by a notice of early closing.
